import React from 'react' ; import './Contact.css' ; import { FaFacebook } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaWhatsappSquare } from "react-icons/fa"; import { AiFillTwitterCircle } from "react-icons/ai"; import { AiOutlineInstagram } from "react-icons/ai"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Contact() { return(












GET IN TOUCH



Hey! We are looking forward to start a project with you!



If you have any questions or queries a member of staff will always be happy to help . feel free to contact us by telephone or email and we will be sure to get back to you as soon as possible.



); }
